data.pricing_trends: Winter prices for flights and accommodations typically rise during the holiday season (mid-December to early January) but can be lower in January and February.
data.booking_windows: Optimal booking time is 2-3 months before travel to secure lower prices. Last-minute bookings often have higher rates.
data.demand: Demand spikes during the holiday season and again in late February for winter sports enthusiasts.
data.competition: Competitors include destinations like Norway and Finland for winter experiences, yet Iceland offers unique geothermal benefits.
